text: I have been coding in PHP for 7 years, including approximately 2 years with Symfony and 2 years with Laravel. Additionally, I have 2 years of experience with Vue 2 and 3, utilizing both Options and Composition API, and 1 year of experience with React.
When developing my websites, I consistently use SASS for styling applications, unless I am utilizing prebuilt components and classes like those offered by Vuetify.
Throughout my development process, I adhere to best practices and maintain clean code using ESLint and Prettier.
